name: Soya Chunk
description: Enjoy the rich aroma and flavor of our Garam Masala, a classic blend of aromatic spices perfect for adding depth to your dishes.

name: Soya mini chunks
description: Indulge in the bold flavors of our Tandoori Masala, a harmonious blend of spices that brings the authentic taste of Indian cuisine to your kitchen.

name: Soya chunks
description: Add a burst of tangy and spicy flavor to your snacks with our Chaat Masala, a zesty blend of traditional Indian spices that elevates every bite.

name: Biryani Masala
description: Experience the exquisite taste of our Biryani Masala, a carefully crafted blend of spices that enhances the aroma and flavor of your favorite biryani dishes.

name: Pav Bhaji Masala
description: Savor the authentic taste of Mumbai street food with our Pav Bhaji Masala, a flavorful blend that brings the essence of the bustling streets right to your home.

name: Rasam Powder
description: Relish the warmth and comfort of South Indian cuisine with our Rasam Powder, a harmonious blend of spices that creates a soul-satisfying bowl of rasam.

name: Sambar Powder
description: Experience the authentic flavors of South India with our Sambar Powder, a traditional blend of spices that adds depth and complexity to your favorite sambar dishes.

name: Punjabi Chole Masala
description: Delight in the rich and hearty flavors of Punjab with our Punjabi Chole Masala, a robust blend of spices that transforms ordinary chickpeas into a culinary masterpiece.

name: Rajma Masala
description: Indulge in the comforting flavors of North India with our Rajma Masala, a fragrant blend of spices that transforms simple kidney beans into a delicious and wholesome meal.

name: Pulao Masala
description: Elevate your rice dishes with our Pulao Masala, a fragrant blend of spices that adds depth and aroma to every spoonful, turning your ordinary rice into a culinary delight.

name: Essential Spice Combo Pack
description: Get all your essential spices in one convenient combo pack, including Garam Masala, Turmeric, Cumin, and Coriander powder. Perfect for every kitchen.

name: Indian Cuisine Combo Pack
description: A complete set of spices for authentic Indian cuisine, including Tandoori Masala, Biryani Masala, Pav Bhaji Masala, and Chaat Masala.

name: South Indian Combo Pack
description: Experience the rich flavors of South India with our combo pack including Sambar Powder, Rasam Powder, and Biryani Masala.
